file_content.text: I gave you all I've got! I swear! Just go before someone sees you.
Coral? Well, this is a surprise.
Never thought you would just turn yourself in.
Okay, first thing? My name's not Coral. Second, what are you talking about?
Right. Of course not. I suppose you're just here for a friendly chat, then?
Who sent you after Mako? I want a name.
Start talking.
There is no "Mako." You've been had.
Could aim for something that won't kill him. Arm or leg. Might speed things along.
Want me to shoot him, Mako?
I kind of like that idea. Just try not to make a mess.
Nobody's gotten shot yet. I think we can have a nice conversation, don't you?
Sure, we're friendly.
Right. I'm feeling the love.
I can imagine what she's told you, hunter, but you're being played. She's anything but a helpless little girl.
Your intel is worthless. This isn't Coral.
You've got the wrong target.
Assuming I buy that, what do you want me to do?
Hey, I've got an idea: Maybe you could tell me who Coral is, and who sent you?
Try answering a question or two. Who's Coral?
Work with me here.
Keep dodging questions, you're going to end up dead.
You're starting to annoy me.
That's... pointed.
Let's keep this short, shall we? I don't want anyone seeing us and reporting this. And I'm not stupid enough to draw on you.
Here's everything I was given on my target. Take it and go.
Datapad's encrypted. See if I can crack it later. This thing...
She... really does look like me, huh?
Whoever she is, she can wait. We have work to do.
You can deal with this later.
Right.
She's got nothin' on you.
[Flirt] You're prettier.
No, she definitely looks like me.
It looks like you've got family.
Long lost sister?
Maybe I do... I'll see what I can find out.
Better get to work on that datapad.
Find out who she is.
Guess I have plenty to keep me busy for a while. We should get going.
Not right now, I'm busy.
